an7.24:4.1: * “Satta vo, bhikkhave, aparihāniye dhamme desessāmi.
an7.24:4.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha … pe …
an7.24:4.3: katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihāniyā dhammā?
an7.24:5.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na kammārāmā bhavissanti, na kammaratā, na kammārāmataṃ anuyuttā;
an7.24:5.2: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an7.24:6.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na bhassārāmā bhavissanti … pe …
an7.24:6.4: na pāpicchā bhavissanti na pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā …
an7.24:6.5: na pāpamittā bhavissanti na pāpasahāyā na pāpasampavaṅkā …
an7.24:6.7: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an7.24:7.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā bhikkhūsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihāniyesu dhammesu bhikkhū sandississanti;
an7.24:7.2: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
